content:
Here is my response:

I think I'll try to tackle a big task or project on Fridays. I've been putting off a report for a while now, and having this extra time will give me the opportunity to finally finish it. Also, since I've started exercising every morning, I feel more alert and focused throughout the day, which will definitely help me stay on track with my tasks. Do you have any tips on how to stay organized and focused when working on a big project?
